nodes.text: Jawiin Danod was an Ithorian male who died in 1.5 ABY during an outbreak of the Blackwing virus on Dathomir. After his death, his undead body was controlled by the virus and kept walking around in the Quarantine Zone until it was destroyed by a spacer.

Jawiin Danod was a Non-Player Character (NPC) in Sony Online Entertainment's MMORPG Star Wars Galaxies and was added to the game as part of the "Death Troopers" update in October 2009. He was one of the Undead boss enemies in the Quarantine Zone that players had to kill to complete a collection.
